## Requirement Reference
- **Requirement ID:** FR#LUR-7
- **Source Document:** Requirement/Functional/V1/2#LookupReterival/FR#LUR-7 - Get Schedule Status Details.md

## Description
System should allow retrieval of schedule status details.

## Request/Response
- **Request:** ScheduleStatusID (guid)
- **Response:** ScheduleStatusID, Name, DisplayName

## User Roles

- Practice Admin
- Tech Team Panel Member
- TA Team Admin
